title: Workflows: Adding a Send Message Block
body:
Workflows: Adding a Send Message Block¶

The Send Message block is only available when designing a workflow for an inbound SMS campaign or an outbound SMS campaign.
This block allows you to send recipients who have reached a certain place in the workflow a customized message or image.

  1. Place a Send Message block in your workflow where desired

  2. Enter a message

  3. If desired, Add Attachment

  4. Click Done

  5. In the workflow, you can now click show more to display the message content
